title: I'm the leader of my club but i'm not in it?
body: The whole clubs issue has been fixed but now when i open up clubs it shows i am not in any clubs, my members see me in the club and as leader but i cannot access it or see it at all. My club name is Doku and my club tag is "$kies". My Ign is LSMIITHY (lSmiithy) Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: There's been some issues with clubs since its restoration today.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate your specific issue, and see what we can do to help.  We'll respond asap!
I have the same problem and just sent a ticket I hope I get this resolved fast D:

> [{quoted}](name=TrueNoxianMight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1k9qgXNy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-29T00:33:47.902+0000)
>
> I have the same problem and just sent a ticket I hope I get this resolved fast D:

>
> There's been some issues with clubs since its restoration today.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate your specific issue, and see what we can do to help.  We'll respond asap!

how long do tickets take? mine is in since saturday. i see all my friends with their tag from my club i made :(
I still have this problem, its shows im online and in the club but I cant see it in my clubs it shows I have none
My wife has the same issue for her all-girls club, exactly as described above. She is very non-tech-savvy so I suppose I'll try to make time to submit a ticket for her tomorrow.

My club name is Doku and my club tag is &quot;$kies&quot;. My Ign is LSMIITHY (lSmiithy) Any help would be appreciated!

Exactly the same thing happened to me, and I sent a ticket and was ignored
I also am having this problem @Porocles. My club was WLAK and my ign is Cjamez13
Same issue. Put in a ticket 2 days ago. So far no response {{item:3070}}
